root: ^Mom and Dad are fighting and yelling at each other
^Throw a tantrum and blame it all on both of them
^Take Mom's side and blame it all on Dad
^Take Dad's side and accuse Mom of starting the fight

res1: ^My parents made up and took me to a counselor. Now I feel myself a psycho
^Mom and Dad were fighting and yelling. I threw a tantrum, and they took me to a therapist. Now I feel myself a psycho.
res2: ^Dad has been acting distant to me. I've got to apologize to him
^Mom and Dad were fighting and yelling. I took Mom's side, and now Dad has been acting cold to me.
res3: ^Mom asked me not to act like this and said that she and Dad both love me. I'm a little embarrassed
^Mom and Dad were fighting and yelling. I took Dad's side. Mom asked me not to act like this and said that she and Dad both love me. I'm a little embarrassed.
res4: ^My parents have made up, but who knows for how long?
^Mom and Dad were fighting and yelling. I didn't interfere. They made up, I just don't know for how long.
